(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      75.36 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     153.33 T
hc      =      65.73 cm

Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.332 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.151 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  6F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 179.09 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.62 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 134.68 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)

  5F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 192.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.65 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 145.00 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 66.02 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 81.11 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.54 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 86.68 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -523.08 T
Mu,maj = -12.14 T-M
Mu,min = 11.86 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -323.94 T
Mu,maj = -15.45 T-M
Mu,min = -66.02 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.84 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 89.88 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.34 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.10 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.47 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 74.39 (t)
Vp           = 74.39 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.37 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.39 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.144 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.131 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  6F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 192.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.66 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 149.89 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)

  5F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 192.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.66 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 149.89 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 66.06 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 90.29 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.54 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 89.58 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -637.61 T
Mu,maj = -18.29 T-M
Mu,min = 15.32 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -408.72 T
Mu,maj = -21.44 T-M
Mu,min = -66.06 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.92 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.84 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.32 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.08 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.50 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 77.17 (t)
Vp           = 77.17 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -40.30 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.17 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.086 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.201 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 132.10 (t)

Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 182.14 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 156.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 174.15 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 150.06 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB7 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1179.04 T
Mu,maj = -114.50 T-M
Mu,min = -4.58 T-M
As     = 99.56 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1228.11 T
Mu,maj = -2.36 T-M
Mu,min = -182.14 T-M
As     = 227.88 cm2

As,req = 227.88 cm2
主筋: 46-#8  (As,pro = 233.08 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 201.04 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 173.38 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 192.23 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 165.78 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 157.31 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 135.67 (t)
Vp           = 157.31 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      76.07 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     157.31 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.350 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.160 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  6F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 179.09 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.62 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 134.68 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  5F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 192.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.65 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 145.00 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 64.88 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 79.71 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 66.68 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 88.19 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -533.33 T
Mu,maj = -11.60 T-M
Mu,min = -12.83 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -321.54 T
Mu,maj = 8.72 T-M
Mu,min = -64.88 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 74.53 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 88.33 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 76.65 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 97.77 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.47 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 74.44 (t)
Vp           = 74.44 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.72 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.44 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.142 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.129 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 404.75) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 152.63 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 152.72 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 159.33 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 153.27 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -814.02 T
Mu,maj = 8.15 T-M
Mu,min = -24.94 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -823.60 T
Mu,maj = -25.50 T-M
Mu,min = 159.33 T-M
As     = 111.15 cm2

As,req = 111.15 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 172.09 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 172.18 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 179.55 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 172.82 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 140.65 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 138.00 (t)
Vp           = 140.65 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      73.55 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     140.65 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.320 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.120 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 149.89 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)

  5F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 192.92 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 109.66 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 149.89 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.93 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 90.11 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.67 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 89.75 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -629.20 T
Mu,maj = -18.31 T-M
Mu,min = -14.14 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -381.63 T
Mu,maj = 0.81 T-M
Mu,min = -65.93 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.77 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.65 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.47 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.27 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.50 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 77.17 (t)
Vp           = 77.17 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -40.09 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.17 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.087 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.202 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB15 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1113.58 T
Mu,maj = -3.12 T-M
Mu,min = 79.77 T-M
As     = 113.90 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -879.44 T
Mu,maj = 21.89 T-M
Mu,min = -192.90 T-M
As     = 176.33 cm2

As,req = 176.33 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 172.79 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 179.52 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.60
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 209.22 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 217.45 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 152.81 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 158.79 (t)
Vp           = 158.79 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -76.16 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     158.79 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.391 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.159 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 152.70 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 194.29 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 186.84 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1226.64 T
Mu,maj = -117.61 T-M
Mu,min = -5.83 T-M
As     = 121.33 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1275.06 T
Mu,maj = -3.14 T-M
Mu,min = -184.54 T-M
As     = 247.04 cm2

As,req = 247.04 cm2
主筋: 50-#8  (As,pro = 253.35 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 164.70 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 190.97 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 175.51 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 204.03 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 136.08 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 158.00 (t)
Vp           = 158.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.32 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     158.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.350 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.167 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 173.05 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 149.11 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 184.36 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 158.72 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 75.39 (t-m)

Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.59 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      27.91 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.34 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.157 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.145 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 94.71 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 73.71 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.78 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 64.60 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 98.51 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 77.23 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 94.85 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 74.24 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.34 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 60.59 (t)
Vp           = 77.34 (t)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 180.64 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 149.13 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 173.08 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 158.67 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 184.31 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB9 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1239.92 T
Mu,maj = -117.61 T-M
Mu,min = 6.53 T-M
As     = 126.07 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1289.41 T
Mu,maj = 4.11 T-M
Mu,min = -184.31 T-M
As     = 251.37 cm2

As,req = 251.37 cm2
主筋: 50-#8  (As,pro = 253.35 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 164.76 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 191.04 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 175.29 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 203.77 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 136.02 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 157.93 (t)
Vp           = 157.93 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.36 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     157.93 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.348 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.166 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)

Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  5F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 206.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.34 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 160.01 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 109.67 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  4F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 207.52 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 160.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.06 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 101.05 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 69.26 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 91.35 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 62.57 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -703.99 T
Mu,maj = 17.55 T-M
Mu,min = 14.77 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -850.46 T
Mu,maj = -13.82 T-M
Mu,min = -101.05 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 108.64 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 79.64 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 98.32 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 71.91 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 82.78 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 60.62 (t)
Vp           = 82.78 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.56 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      82.78 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.106 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.206 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 153.13 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 159.18 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 186.51 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 193.94 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB17 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1120.87 T
Mu,maj = -2.07 T-M
Mu,min = -79.42 T-M
As     = 117.42 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -898.20 T
Mu,maj = -22.51 T-M
Mu,min = -193.94 T-M
As     = 183.22 cm2

As,req = 183.22 cm2
主筋: 40-#8  (As,pro = 202.68 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 172.65 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 179.38 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 210.35 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 218.62 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 153.20 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 159.20 (t)
Vp           = 159.20 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -75.88 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     159.20 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.389 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.157 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 178.78 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 172.08 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 220.27 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 220.42 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 159.62 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 157.00 (t)
Vp           = 159.62 (t)

======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.21, 145.00, 489.00) = 106.21 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.21 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 2.43 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 1.62 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  5F G10(55x70)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 144.65 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 72.53 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 93.24 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 65.70 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 86.39 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -583.31 T
Mu,maj = 11.54 T-M
Mu,min = -12.20 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -786.39 T
Mu,maj = 93.24 T-M
Mu,min = -9.10 T-M
As     = 94.95 cm2

As,req = 94.95 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 96.91 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 75.97 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 96.74 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 82.77 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.46 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 63.50 (t)
Vp           = 77.46 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      39.44 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.46 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.158 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.170 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

  4F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 207.52 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 160.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.06 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 96.98 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 66.47 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 95.43 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 65.37 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -705.76 T
Mu,maj = 18.61 T-M
Mu,min = -15.85 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -884.62 T
Mu,maj = 20.68 T-M
Mu,min = -96.98 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 104.27 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 76.44 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 102.71 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 75.13 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 82.79 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 60.63 (t)
Vp           = 82.79 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.47 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      82.79 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.106 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.211 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.60 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 179.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 135.19 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 124.99 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 120.20 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.65
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 200.56 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 200.69 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB11 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1215.91 T
Mu,maj = -3.65 T-M
Mu,min = 78.12 T-M
As     = 103.61 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -947.77 T
Mu,maj = 21.12 T-M
Mu,min = 200.56 T-M
As     = 155.18 cm2

As,req = 155.18 cm2
主筋: 32-#8  (As,pro = 162.14 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 140.89 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 135.57 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.65
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 226.14 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 226.26 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 146.82 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 144.73 (t)
Vp           = 146.82 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      72.58 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     146.82 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.330 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.124 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.60 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 179.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.15 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 181.40 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 156.17 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 167.42 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 144.13 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB2 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1425.88 T
Mu,maj = 28.83 T-M
Mu,min = 0.21 T-M
As     = 106.41 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1417.97 T
Mu,maj = -0.29 T-M
Mu,min = -181.40 T-M
As     = 221.99 cm2

As,req = 221.99 cm2
主筋: 44-#8  (As,pro = 222.95 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 200.56 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 172.53 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 185.10 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 159.23 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 154.26 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 132.70 (t)
Vp           = 154.26 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      78.44 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     154.26 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.288 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.124 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 103.48 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 81.01 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 90.32 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 70.70 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.52 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 60.68 (t)
Vp           = 77.52 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =       6.99 T (COMB54 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.52 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.335 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.334 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 64.76 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 94.54 (t-m)

Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 67.29 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 92.02 (t-m)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 191.87 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 165.19 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 156.95 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 135.12 (t-m)

Pu     = -1438.50 T
Mu,maj = 26.08 T-M
Mu,min = 2.38 T-M
As     = 112.53 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)

Mu,maj = -4.54 T-M
Mu,min = -191.87 T-M
As     = 243.48 cm2

主筋: 50-#8  (As,pro = 253.35 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 212.14 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 182.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 173.52 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 149.27 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 154.26 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 132.70 (t)
Vp           = 154.26 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

Vp      =     154.26 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.287 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.125 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 193.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.04 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 145.57 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 62.61 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 82.83 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 69.44 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 91.86 (t-m)

彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)

Mu,maj = -10.40 T-M
Mu,min = -14.26 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

Mu,min = -62.61 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 71.93 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 91.89 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 79.78 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 101.91 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.68 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 77.52 (t)
Vp           = 77.52 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      29.37 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      77.52 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.144 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.132 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 404.75) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.03 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.02 cm2)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 123.94 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 124.02 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.66
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 209.39 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 201.37 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB13 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1215.41 T
Mu,maj = -0.33 T-M
Mu,min = -81.70 T-M
As     = 103.36 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -963.19 T
Mu,maj = -26.44 T-M
Mu,min = 209.39 T-M
As     = 174.40 cm2

As,req = 174.40 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 139.75 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 139.84 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.66
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 236.03 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 227.11 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 150.31 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 146.78 (t)
Vp           = 150.31 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      75.53 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     150.31 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.339 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.119 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 96.99 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 75.92 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.64 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 63.60 (t)
Vp           = 77.64 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  4F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 207.52 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 160.68 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  3F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 151.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 193.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 110.02 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 150.46 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 61.54 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 89.84 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 70.51 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 96.43 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -730.69 T
Mu,maj = -19.34 T-M
Mu,min = -12.86 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -421.47 T
Mu,maj = 0.94 T-M
Mu,min = -61.54 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 70.73 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 96.69 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 81.02 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 103.51 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 60.70 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 80.08 (t)
Vp           = 80.08 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      25.57 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      80.08 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.082 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.180 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 179.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.60 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 135.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.03 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 392.25) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.03 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.02 cm2)

  3F B11(55x70)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 156.04 (t-m)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 145.10 (t-m)
