(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.36
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 109.09 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 113.44 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.92
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 259.71 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 270.96 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB15 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1315.89 T
Mu,maj = -6.83 T-M
Mu,min = 98.74 T-M
As     = 152.14 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1017.89 T
Mu,maj = 26.46 T-M
Mu,min = -270.96 T-M
As     = 286.56 cm2

As,req = 286.56 cm2
主筋: 60-#8  (As,pro = 304.02 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.36
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 123.03 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 127.87 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.92
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 292.18 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 304.84 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 166.09 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 173.08 (t)
Vp           = 173.08 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.31 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     173.08 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.429 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.162 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.14 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm

Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.48(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 179.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 136.95 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 139.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.33 (t-m)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.65 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.44 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 125.70 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 140.78 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.77
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 192.90 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 230.77 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1407.33 T
Mu,maj = -148.46 T-M
Mu,min = -18.17 T-M
As     = 166.28 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1467.52 T
Mu,maj = -14.71 T-M
Mu,min = -230.77 T-M
As     = 321.70 cm2

As,req = 321.70 cm2
主筋: 64-#8  (As,pro = 324.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 138.80 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 155.47 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.77
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 211.49 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 253.67 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 140.11 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 163.66 (t)
Vp           = 163.66 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -83.40 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     163.66 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.328 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.152 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(104.13, 145.00, 489.00) = 104.13 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (104.13 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 2.34 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 1.56 cm2)


Y 方向 柱頂
  3F G3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 1.56(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 193.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 144.52 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(103.71, 145.00, 489.00) = 103.71 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (103.71 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 2.32 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 1.54 cm2)


Y 方向 柱底
  2F G3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 10-#8 + 1.54(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 150.72 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 122.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 112.91 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.62 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 81.12 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 61.76 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 72.12 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 56.60 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -657.65 T
Mu,maj = -14.50 T-M
Mu,min = 8.49 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -910.04 T
Mu,maj = 81.12 T-M
Mu,min = 6.63 T-M
As     = 72.23 cm2

As,req = 72.23 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 70.96 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 90.65 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 72.89 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 95.44 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 57.54 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 74.44 (t)
Vp           = 74.44 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      28.66 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.44 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.134 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.108 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.44
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 67.34 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 86.03 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 67.97 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 99.34 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 54.12 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 74.15 (t)
Vp           = 74.15 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      25.96 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.15 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.058 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.149 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 125.78 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 140.87 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.77
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 202.02 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 230.20 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 162.20 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 139.53 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.77
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 251.45 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 209.64 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 165.46 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 139.67 (t)
Vp           = 165.46 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      85.90 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     165.46 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.327 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.134 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 10-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.52 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 10-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 1.01 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.72 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.48 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.06 (t-m)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.13 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.66 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.44 cm2)

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 73.62 (t-m)

Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 79.69 (t-m)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 179.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.60 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 135.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.03 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 404.75) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.03 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.02 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F B2(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 2.02(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 11-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 166.46 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 208.30 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 120.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 156.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(119.42, 145.00, 262.25) = 119.42 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (119.42 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.06 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.04 cm2)


X 方向 柱底
  2F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 134.93 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.35 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(117.92, 145.00, 404.75) = 117.92 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 145.10 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 108.48 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 112.80 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.91
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 255.86 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 266.95 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB17 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1321.88 T
Mu,maj = -4.46 T-M
Mu,min = -88.23 T-M
As     = 155.04 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1039.81 T
Mu,maj = -15.15 T-M
Mu,min = -266.95 T-M
As     = 284.80 cm2

As,req = 284.80 cm2
主筋: 60-#8  (As,pro = 304.02 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 122.35 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 127.16 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.91
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 287.86 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 300.33 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 164.08 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 170.99 (t)
Vp           = 170.99 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.79 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     170.99 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.416 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.152 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.14 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 119.19 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.93
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 306.03 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 293.32 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 171.96 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 165.00 (t)
Vp           = 171.96 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

======================================================================================================================================================

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.10 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.07 cm2)


X 方向 柱頂
  3F B3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 2.07(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 193.81 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 151.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 145.57 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 110.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(119.42, 145.00, 262.25) = 119.42 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (119.42 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.06 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.04 cm2)

  ASB = 9-#8

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.40 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.40
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 69.09 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 52.23 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.88
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 152.67 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 104.50 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB13 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -940.50 T
Mu,maj = 0.93 T-M
Mu,min = -74.10 T-M
As     = 72.34 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -876.94 T
Mu,maj = -17.72 T-M
Mu,min = 152.67 T-M
As     = 184.30 cm2

As,req = 184.30 cm2
主筋: 40-#8  (As,pro = 202.68 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.40
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 76.65 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 60.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.88
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 208.79 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 159.67 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 114.18 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 87.87 (t)
Vp           = 114.18 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      40.34 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     114.18 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.306 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.205 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 150.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.38 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 86.42 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 59.19 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.55
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 99.36 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 65.81 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -812.83 T
Mu,maj = 22.74 T-M
Mu,min = -24.02 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1040.20 T
Mu,maj = 18.54 T-M
Mu,min = -86.42 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 93.01 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 68.03 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.55
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 106.54 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 75.61 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 79.82 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 57.46 (t)
Vp           = 79.82 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      45.67 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      79.82 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.079 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.158 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(117.92, 145.00, 392.25) = 117.92 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (117.92 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 2.99 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 1.99 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.37 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.11
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 32.69 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 31.33 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB39 Min 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1389.67 T
Mu,maj = -48.82 T-M
Mu,min = -214.94 T-M
As     = 180.13 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1047.45 T
Mu,maj = -5.25 T-M
Mu,min = -32.69 T-M
As     = 100.00 cm2

As,req = 180.13 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.11
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 36.78 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 35.25 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 420.92 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 420.92 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 115.87 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 115.49 (t)
Vp           = 115.87 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -75.14 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     115.87 T
hc      =      90.73 cm
Ag      =   10000.00 cm2
Ac      =    8464.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.143 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.111 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.65 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.44 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.12
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 35.74 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 31.38 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB11 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1510.28 T
Mu,maj = 20.33 T-M
Mu,min = 366.92 T-M
As     = 254.33 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1621.82 T
Mu,maj = -10.60 T-M
Mu,min = -35.74 T-M
As     = 156.46 cm2

As,req = 254.33 cm2
主筋: 52-#8  (As,pro = 263.48 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.12
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 39.31 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 34.45 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 253.88 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 253.88 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 74.22 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 73.00 (t)
Vp           = 74.22 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      50.91 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      74.22 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =   10500.00 cm2
Ac      =    8844.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.784 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.033 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.27 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.84 cm2 / cm

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 15-#8 + 4.38(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 218.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 122.30 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 169.22 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.69 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.14
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 23.72 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 16.23 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB3 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -886.30 T
Mu,maj = 194.39 T-M
Mu,min = -78.02 T-M
As     = 169.17 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -876.79 T
Mu,maj = 5.47 T-M
Mu,min = -23.72 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 169.17 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.14
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 26.28 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 18.65 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 359.07 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 359.07 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 97.56 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 95.63 (t)
Vp           = 97.56 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =       8.64 T (COMB53 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      97.56 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.266 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Mu,min = 35.47 T-M
As     = 137.78 cm2

As,req = 215.90 cm2
主筋: 44-#8  (As,pro = 222.95 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.12
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 34.19 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 39.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 234.39 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 234.39 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 67.99 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 69.21 (t)
Vp           = 69.21 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -48.49 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      69.21 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =   10500.00 cm2
Ac      =    8844.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.784 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.014 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.14 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 7-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      57.18 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     109.09 T
hc      =      90.73 cm
Ag      =   10000.00 cm2
Ac      =    8464.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.125 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.131 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(119.42, 145.00, 262.25) = 119.42 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (119.42 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.06 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.04 cm2)

  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 9-#8

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 179.31 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.35 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 134.93 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (129.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 3.53 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 2.35 cm2)

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 47.83 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 61.48 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 34.97 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (193.25 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 6.57 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 4.38 cm2)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.18
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 21.27 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 28.89 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB35 Min 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -918.09 T
Mu,maj = -177.13 T-M
Mu,min = -25.05 T-M
As     = 112.82 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -404.99 T
Mu,maj = 6.19 T-M
Mu,min = 21.27 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 112.82 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.18
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 24.44 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 32.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 281.02 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 281.02 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 77.33 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 79.24 (t)
Vp           = 79.24 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      38.27 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =      79.24 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.090 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.085 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(117.92, 145.00, 404.75) = 117.92 cm
版配筋 #3@15(fy=2800)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (117.92 - 55) / 15 * 0.71 = 2.99 cm2 (等值梁 fy = 1.99 cm2)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.37 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.07
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 21.33 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 20.44 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB13 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1434.34 T
Mu,maj = -2.14 T-M
Mu,min = -188.12 T-M
As     = 148.86 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1078.04 T
Mu,maj = 5.63 T-M
Mu,min = -21.33 T-M
As     = 100.00 cm2

As,req = 148.86 cm2
主筋: 32-#8  (As,pro = 162.14 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.07
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 23.99 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 23.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 379.42 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 379.42 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 102.13 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 101.88 (t)
Vp           = 102.13 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      72.85 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     102.13 T
hc      =      90.73 cm
Ag      =   10000.00 cm2
Ac      =    8464.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.092 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.083 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================

Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 28.50 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.18
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = 22.47 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = 30.31 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = 445.89 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = 445.89 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 118.57 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 120.56 (t)
Vp           = 120.56 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      51.86 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =     120.56 T
hc      =     100.73 cm
Ag      =    9900.00 cm2
Ac      =    8364.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.152 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.604 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.143 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(4) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm
